title: Healthy roast chicken
ingredients: ['1 lemon', '2 sprigs of rosemary, chopped', '2 sprigs of thyme, chopped', '6-8 cloves of garlic, chopped', 'sea salt and freshly ground pepper to taste', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 (2kg/4 lb) whole chicken', '300g (11 oz) new potatoes', '1/2 butternut squash or same amount of carrots and parsnips', '2 red onions, chopped', '250ml (8 fl oz) white wine']
